album.title: Will I Dream During The Process?

track.name: As It Is
comments: i come here to feel better
his best composition for sure and one of those tracks for which you are thankful to live on this earth and in this time
Yer nice sounds, floating around the room, me or the music?

brilliant in all it's subtleties. the way the chord progression moves over into the vast fluffy percussive sounds is truly remarkable. It never sounds synthetic or forced. Such a rich and warm sound for something so on the brink of "loungy" manages to stay on the right side of profound. absolutely gorgeous. one of my favourite songs.

"As It Is" continues to be my single most favorite song, even after listening to thousands of other tracks since I came across it years ago :]

It's such a beautiful track; I could listen to it for eternity :D
gorgeous ambience, really carries well throughout the track.
Beautiful as most of Yagya's works...
